Class NamedEntityReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • NamedEntityReader

  • public class NamedEntityReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a Named Entity Reader that is applicable to preprocessed text.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NamedEntityReader(java.lang.String fileName)
      This constructs the Named Entity Reader.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void readNamedEntities(SentenceList sentences)
      Given the filename and the text with NE-tags this keeps those words that are tagged as person or organisation.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • NamedEntityReader

        public NamedEntityReader(java.lang.String fileName)
        This constructs the Named Entity Reader.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file the sentences are in.

    • Method Detail

      • readNamedEntities

        public void readNamedEntities(SentenceList sentences)
        Given the filename and the text with NE-tags this keeps those words that are tagged as person or organisation. If a Named Entity consists of more than one word these will be merged.
        Parameters:
        sentences - The untagged sentences to which the Named Entities that were found will be assigned.
